thread.title: Great hotel on the Airport RER B Line
thread.title_full: Great hotel on the Airport RER B Line - Review of Hotel Le Clos Medicis, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: novamatt
title: Great hotel on the Airport RER B Line
text:
Stayed here one night before our trip back home via the RER B to CDG Airport. Great location and plenty of nice little places to eat around as well. Literally 5 minutes from the RER B line, and we found it to not be a busy stop which made the luggage situation easier. Very cute lobby with a working fireplace, so cozy. Our room was a bit larger than the other place we stayed in Paris, and had very lovely wood beams on the ceiling and a small shared terrace. It was so nice and lovely! I'll consider this place again for a longer stay if I return to Paris!
Room Tip: Room 12 had a terrace See more room tips
